titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should encourage and support the Republic of Ireland in its development of an international world trade and financial center in Dublin, Ireland.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

bill.summary: 10/14/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should support the Republic of Ireland in its development of an international world trade and financial center in Dublin, Ireland.
